description: Five welders visiting the Isle of Man from England are jailed for breaking Covid-19 quarantine rules.
title: Coronavirus: Visiting workers who broke island virus laws jailed
title_page: Coronavirus: Visiting workers who broke island virus laws jailed - BBC News
maintext: When another customer asked one of the men why they were wearing masks, suspicions were aroused when he replied they had "just got off the boat", the court heard.
